name: Trello: full width labels (no text)
description: Have your labels span the full width of the card, to make them more prominent, or to use them as colored separators. Think of the possibilities...
additional_info: Full width labels, no text, no label names. Square corners, not rounded. It may work best when using single labels for each card, but it's up to you. Do you want full width label, with visible label names? Then try out my other extension: Trello: full width labels with text
